event.title: 2013, Tema is the eleventh most populous settlement in Ghana, with a population of approximately 161,612 people –

data.event: As of 2013, Tema is the eleventh most populous settlement in Ghana, with a population of approximately 161,612 people – a marked decrease from its 2005 figure of 209,000.
As of 2013, Tema is the eleventh most populous settlement in Ghana, with a population of approximately 161,612 people – a marked decrease from its 2005 figure of 209,000.

event.title: the construction of a large harbour in 1961

data.event: Tema was commissioned by Ghana's first president, Kwame Nkrumah, and grew rapidly after the construction of a large harbour in 1961.

event.title: now a major trading center, home to an oil refinery and numerous factories, and is linked

data.event: It is now a major trading center, home to an oil refinery and numerous factories, and is linked to Accra by a highway and railway.
Tema is one of Ghana's two deep seaports, the other being Sekondi-Takoradi.Tema became an Autonomous Council in 1974 and was elevated to the status of a Metropolitan Assembly in December, 1990.

event.title: was elevated to the status of a Metropolitan Assembly in December, 1990
